actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To eliminate the requirement that States collect Social Security numbers from applicants for recreational licenses.

summary.text: Amends part A (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families) (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirement that states collect Social Security numbers from applicants for recreational licenses.

titles.title: To eliminate the requirement that States collect Social Security numbers from applicants for recreational licenses.
